name: Witch Upon A Star (Fabi, Jack Chateau-Loney)
name_original: Witch Upon A Star (Fabi, Jack Chateau-Loney)
description:
After eating a mysterious mushroom apprentice witch Stella turns into a ghost. Now she has to figure out how to return back to normal. But it seems that her time is very limited - if she does not return to her body in time she will stay part of the ghost realm forever. 

✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ✧ ✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ✧ ✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ✧

This game was made for Ludum Dare 51, with the theme Every 10 Seconds.  Our take on this is a star disappearing every ten seconds, and once your time is up you stay a ghost. 

✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ✧ ✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ✧ ✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ✧

Credits:
